title: Katie Price has 'got back together' with ex-boyfriend Kris Boyson
text:
Katie Price has reportedly got back together with her ex-boyfriend Kris Boyson.

The former glamour model, 41, called off her engagement to the personal trainer, 30, after she had a fling with Charles Drury, 22.

According to The Sun, the couple are now back on and Kris is already in the process of moving his belongings back into Katie's mansion.

Reunited: Katie Price has reportedly got back together with her ex-boyfriend Kris Boyson

An insider said: 'He's taken her back and they're already moving some of his things back into the house.

'They're officially back on - everyone's shocked that he didn't make it harder for her, but they're back to being loved-up again like they never split up.'

MailOnline has contacted representatives for Katie for further comment.

The couple's reunion comes after Katie had been seen making a swift exit from her ex Kris Boyson's home on Tuesday morning.

Fling: The former glamour model, 41, called off her engagement to Kris after she had a fling with Charles Drury, 22 (pictured far left)

Joined by the fitness trainer as she sneaked out of his abode in Kent at 8am for the school run, the ex model cut a dishevelled appearance.

Katie unfollowed Charles on social media this week after it was reported he refused to sign a document promising not to reveal any of her secrets.

Katie and Charles were reportedly introduced by a builder working on the reality star's mansion, who encouraged her to follow Charles on social media.

Charles is based in Chesterfield, and he and Katie had been accused of previously meeting up at a hotel in the Cotswolds after his good looks caught her eye on social media.

Back together: According to The Sun , the couple are now back on and Kris is already in the process of moving his belongings back into Katie's mansion (pictured in July 2018)

When they met Katie was still thought to be in a relationship with Kris, but she reportedly dumped her boyfriend by text after being accused of cheating when she secretly flew Charles to Turkey.

After the cheating claims came to light, Kris was pictured chucking all of Katie's belongings out of his house, including clothes and children's toys.

In July, Katie revealed Kris had popped the question after just over a year together.

The TV star - who is still legally married to third husband Kieran Hayler - made the shock announcement during an appearance on Loose Women.

A source said: 'They're officially back on - everyone's shocked that he didn't make it harder for her, but they're back to being loved-up again like they never split up' (pictured in July 2018)

Flashing off the diamond sparkler on her ring finger, she declared: 'Kris bought the ring for that finger. I have got luck in my life!'

The cost of the ring - a 3 carat round brilliant and a three-row diamond band - has been estimated at £65,000-£70,000 by WP Diamonds CEO and diamond expert Andrew Brown.

Charles' fling with Katie came to an abrupt halt though after Katie was recently seen sneaking out of Kris' house.

Charles has hinted at the end of the romance on Instagram, posting on Monday night: 'You never really forget the ones who touched your heart; regardless whether its the ones who broke it or healed it.'

Ex: Katie unfollowed Charles on social media this week after it was reported he refused to sign a document promising not to reveal any of her secrets

He shared a second quote that read: 'Good things come to those who wait. But better things come to those who work for it.'

It comes as Love Island producers are said to have recruited Charles to appear on the upcoming winter series of the reality show.

According to The Sun, Charles has been in talks with ITV2 bosses to appear in the upcoming series which will hit screens in January.

The newly single hunk, who boasts 9k Instagram followers, could prove to be TV gold as insiders hope he'll spill secrets on Katie, 41, and their short fling.

TV: It comes as Love Island producers are said to have recruited Charles to appear on the upcoming winter series of the reality show

The builder has reportedly been on Love Island bosses' radar since last year but was dating someone so was ruled out of the matchmaking series.

A source said: 'now he's single, producers called him up and asked him to re-audition for the show.'

'Nothing's signed yet and he's not even sure if he wants to do it but they're keen to meet him,' adding that 'Katie will be furious when she finds out – he'd have girls falling over him, and he's bound to talk about what dating Katie was like if he makes it into the villa.'
description: The former glamour model, 41, called off her engagement to the personal trainer, 30, after she had a fling with Charles Drury, 22.
